features: ✔ REST YOUR FEET ON SOMETHING AMAZING: Step into comfort. The Ergonomic Foot Cushion is the newest addition to our award-winning cushions and a game-changing addition to your setup, especially if you sit for long hours.

✔ NO MORE FOOT SWELLING OR SLEEPY LEGS: The patented design gently elevates your legs for posture-perfect relief and added height. Enjoy enhanced blood circulation and hip, knee, and ankle pain relief that will truly make a difference.
✔ A SPA FOR YOUR FEET WHENEVER YOUR SIT: The proprietary raised WaveMassage ridges helps stimulate circulation and provide deep tension release.
✔ LIKE STEPPING ON CLOUD: It's made with our signature CloudSupport cushioning that absorbs pressure while resting your feet. Give it a try and feel the effect!

✔ KICK UP YOUR FEET AND ENJOY: The Ergonomic Foot Cushion matches and pairs beautifully with our back & seat cushion. It completes any sitting setup, whether under a desk or in front of the recliner or sofa to help you sit in pure comfort.
body.description: Specially shaped by our in-house ergonomist to enhance circulation and provide enjoyable relief, the Ergonomic Foot Cushion is a difference-maker that fits under any desk/table to pamper your feet and take away unwanted tension. It pairs perfectly with our seat cushion and lumbar pillow for the ultimate comfort from top to bottom, give it a try and feel the difference! Pamper your feet in LUXURIOUS cushioning. Home Office/Office Enhance the comfort of your chair and enjoy a relaxing foot spa during work. Couch or Recliner Kick up your feet and enjoy soft and cushiony support with your favorite show. Color matching seat cushions and lumbar pillows are available to blend seamlessly into any space. Home Decor Friendly Dimensions: 17 W x 10.5 Lx 5 H inches Pair with our matching Seat Cushionand Lumbar Pillowfor total comfort from top to bottom. In stock at our CA warehouse, ready to ship

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend!!! Pain to carry. Once you are seated and its on the floor it works beautifully. I purchased a foot hammock as my flight was long and overseas. I used both to change feet position as my feet swell sooo bad. The foot pad is great it is like a messager as well. I rubbed my feet back and forth on it with my c-socks. I will never fly without this again. Wish they made a bag to fit their seat cushion and foot pad to carry on plane. Both are life savers. Great, amazing quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cushy and helps with ergonomic pillows added height
reviews.reviewText: After buying cushion lab’s seat cushion, it ended up being too tall for my legs to touch the ground. My chair is, unfortunately, not adjustable so by adding the foot rest my feet no longer swing in the air or strain to touch the floor. I don’t know about the claims or massaging though, definitely not enough pressure for that in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a little softer than I'd like
reviews.reviewText: This gets my feet at the proper angle to have good ergonomic support and I do like the little bit of texture so I can rub my feet on it. It's very cozy, especially in the morning.I like that it doesn't slide around on the floor. It took a couple tries to get it in the right spot under my desk but once I got it in place I knew it. I could feel the alignment fall into place and I know that it won't drift away from me through the day.It also shipped really REALLY fast if thats important to you.Things I'd like: I'd rather it had an ivory color option and I wish it were a bit more firm. But it does solve the ergonomic issue for my home office desk and for that reason I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The person that I purchased this for is short and the height of this just barely reaches their feet. But, they love how good it feels and how comfortable it is. Now, instead of the recliner leg being brought up, they use the chair as a rocker and push off of this great foot rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This foot rest is the perfect height to fit under my desk. My knees don’t come up to my desk which happened when I tried other foot rests. Before, by habit, I would put my feet on my chair’s wheels which was causing me lots of pain in my arches. Very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product. Rests my legs while sitting long hours at desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars There are better ones available
reviews.reviewText: The foot rest is a little too small for my liking. It's also not as high as I would like it to be. I am 250 lbs. and don't feel that the foot rest is not as big so I end up just having one leg on top of it. So as far as comfort, it's not comfortable for me in this retrospect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps since recliner has quit lifting
